author: Faizan Farooque
title: Bitcoin Dips Below $117K After Crypto Bills Get Shot Down in Congress
description: Political gridlock pulls the plug on rally -- for now
content:
Bitcoin (BTC-USD) hit the brakes Tuesday, dropping below $117,000 after crypto-focused bills ran into political resistance in the U.S. House of Representatives.
